paper_title: Uncertainty-aware phase prediction of RMPEAs via mixture density networks

claims.claim: At the initial stage, only 61% of the 500 samples that the active-learning approach identified as BCC Ti-alloys are actually BCC
instruction: The code loads the MDN model trained on Ti-free alloys, evaluates the Ti-alloy compositions, executes the active-learning selection step to identify 500 candidate BCC samples, and then computes the accuracy of those 500 predictions.
Confirm that the reported accuracy is 0.61.
